flawed_nl_solution:
The school bought 10 x 20 = <<10*20=200>>200 bottled water.
There were 200 - 70 = <<200-70=103>>103 bottled water left after the first game.
So, there were 103 - 20 = <<103-20=83>>83 bottled water used during the second game.
#### 83

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 103. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
